name: novu
description: Novu is an open-source notification platform that enables managing and sending notifications across channels like email, SMS, chat, and push. It includes templates, workflows, logs, and supports self-hosting or cloud.
features: Multi-channel notifications: Send messages via email, SMS, push, in-app, and chat from one platform.
Workflow builder: Design notification flows with triggers, delays, and conditional logic.
Template management: Create reusable notification templates with variables and localization.
Provider integration: Connect to SendGrid, Twilio, FCM, Slack, and dozens of other services.
Subscriber management: Organize users with preferences, topics, and segmentation.
Notification center: Embed in-app notification feeds in your applications with SDK.
Delivery tracking: Monitor notification status, delivery rates, and user engagement.
A/B testing: Test different notification variants to optimize engagement and conversion.
Rate limiting: Control notification frequency to prevent overwhelming users.
Digest notifications: Batch multiple events into periodic summary notifications.
API-first design: Integrate notifications into applications with comprehensive REST API.
Self-hosted or cloud: Deploy on your infrastructure or use managed cloud service.
